fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm TODO visibility with plus suffix versions
fields.request_details: Simulate a local build that appends a trailing '+' to the installed version (for example, set the Node installed version to 0.1.31+). Open the Release Manager Future Actions view and confirm TODO entries created for both 0.1.31 and 0.1.31+ remain visible and are not marked stale. Verify the release checklist still blocks publishing until the tasks are completed.
